mbean.name: user:service=QuartzService,name=QuartzService
mbean.attribute: org.quartz.scheduler.instanceName = DefaultQuartzScheduler org.quartz.scheduler.rmi.export = false org.quartz.scheduler.rmi.proxy = false org.quartz.scheduler.xaTransacted = false org.quartz.threadPool.class = org.quartz.simpl.SimpleThreadPool org.quartz.threadPool.threadCount = 5 org.quartz.threadPool.threadPriority = 4
